Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd emphasized the importance of team effort as key players Kyrie Irving and Luka Doncic are out due to injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas Mavericks guard Kyrie Irving is expected to miss one to two weeks with a bulging disk in his back.
Leading scorer Luka Doncic is also out due to a left calf strain, missing his sixth game.
The Dallas offense is missing 52.4 points per game with Irving and Doncic absent.
